message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair to me!
I think I deserve a bit more, 60-40 is still a good deal for you!
I'm willing to compromise a little, but I still think 55-45 is a fair split, considering inflation is hurting you more than me.
Considering the inflation, I need a bit more to make up for the loss. 62-38 is a fair split, don't you think?
Okay, I'll go up to 58, but that's my final offer.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's settle this!
